programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena feasts with magician and Vegas legend Penn Jillette. He explores the off-strip Sin City vegan food scene, indulging in plant-based “Beef” Wellington, sky-high waffles, and intricate dim sum, then dines with cookbook author Carleigh Bodrug.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Bathed in sunshine and Big Latin Culture, Mena learns to make classic Cubanos and traditional Puerto Rican mofongo—vegan-style. He cruises the seas with cookbook author Radhi Devlukia, takes actor Matt Murray to South Beach for mouth-watering molten lava cake, and harvests and tastes astonishing exotic fruits.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the heart of Japan, Mena devours plant-based sushi and ramen. He learns to cook soba noodles from scratch, home-made mochi, and takes part in a traditional tea ceremony.

programme.desc: Ben experiences the art of cheese making. He meets a capsicum producer and learns about the provenance of the onion.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Blood Hunters: Rise of the Hybri
programme.desc: Gabriella is driven by vengeance after a hybrid monster slaughters her family. On her quest, she joins a squad of Blood Hunters and together they wage war against ruthless underworld warlords, igniting a brutal showdown.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael makes a decadent Tuscan-style breakfast for dinner using panettone bread to make French toast, which she serves with a prosciutto and melon platter.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy checks out two legendary restaurants that originated as people's actual homes. First, he's going to the Loveless Cafe to taste their southern staples like crispy fried chicken and tender pork chops.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Bill's swinging-arm growth prevents him from living his retirement dreams. Regina distracts from the many moles on her face with a vibrant sense of style.

programme.title: One Night Stand Murder
programme.desc: A woman must fight to clear her name after she wakes up in an unfamiliar house with a dead man - and no memory of what happened. Based on true events.

programme.title: The Killer I Picked Up
programme.desc: When a hardworking single mom starts a side job as a rideshare driver to help pay for her daughter's college tuition, she becomes the unrelenting obsession of a mysterious rider with a dark past.

programme.title: Million Dollar Zombie Flips

programme.title: Earth Sweepers
programme.desc: After a 1,536km journey, the Earth-Cleaning Bros arrive in Olang Ol, a pristine nomadic village. They build their own ger and even try milking yaks!

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael cooks up pork loin chops with sweet onions and apples, serving it with twice-baked potatoes topped with sour cream and chives - all in minutes!

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine

programme.desc: In the 1970s, the board game industry is aimed almost entirely at children, until a literal game changer comes along in Trivial Pursuit. Redefining the possibilities for adult fun.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: There have been many sacred relics believed to be imbued with mystical powers. Is it possible that these ordinary items, like a tooth, or a soldier's spear, can have the ability to perform miracles?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout the world, there are ancient structures that defy explanation. How were ancient civilisations able to build such extraordinary structures? And what purpose did they serve?

programme.title: Mountain Men (S13)
programme.desc: Marty installs floats on his bush plane and flies to a remote lake to hunt moose; Lauro and Neil harvest driftwood and build a log river raft from scratch.

programme.desc: Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 10
programme.desc: Michael befuddles a hardware store patron with a collapsible spray paint can, and cuts a costume shop employee down to size when he shrinks into a leprechaun outfit. Later, a museum employee makes the discovery of a lifetime when a preserved egg hatches a baby dinosaur.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 11
programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 1
programme.desc: The White House senior members handle difficult situations.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.title: Smallville S2 7
programme.desc: A mysterious woman, Rachel Dunlevy, visits the Kents and claims to be Clark's mother, prompting them to finally tell Clark what happened after they discovered him in the cornfield that fateful day.

programme.title: Smallville S2 8
programme.desc: Clark tests the limits of his powers to save his young telepathic friend, Ryan (recurring guest star RYAN KELLEY), from an evil doctor who wants to control the boy's abilities.

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016)
programme.desc: A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie --The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guy Ritchie brings his dynamic style to the epic fantasy action adventure "King Arthur: Legend of the Sword." Starring Charlie Hunnam in the title role, the film is an iconoclastic take on the classic Excalibur myth, tracing Arthur's journey from the streets to the throne. When the child Arthur's father is murdered, Vortigern (Jude Law), Arthur's uncle, seizes the crown. Robbed of his birthright and with no idea who he truly is, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, his life is turned upside down and he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy...whether he likes it or not.

Armed with his demon-slaying sword, he battles the demons to save Liu Li and protect the city.

programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Chniwla Et Boubris

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
